1604066311_mirrored_funny110_github.body: Works for me with rev 3221 by using [Linux Deploy](https://github.com/meefik/linuxdeploy/) app, from the commits rev 3220 has some issue, but @shortcutme pushed it to ZeroUpdate and forgot to push rev 3221.

1604067324_mirrored_slrslr_github.body:
If you are talking the backup feature on ZeroHello or on "0" zite config panel, I have the same issue on FF in Archlinux, and this command fixs the zip file:
`$ zip -F file.zip --out new.zip`

1604067452_mirrored_slrslr_github.body: @slrslr you need to install the build dependencies from https://github.com/ofek/coincurve#installation
